prompt:
Task: Extract all supermarket deals from this flyer page.
Return ONLY valid JSON (no extra text).
Schema (JSON array of objects):
[
  {
    "product_name": string | null,
    "price": string | number | null,
    "discount": string | null,
    "unit": string | null,
    "original_price": string | number | null
  }
]
Rules:
- Use null if a field is missing.
- Keep prices as numbers or numeric strings (e.g., "1.99").
- Product name should focus on the item, not marketing text.
- Unit should be the package/unit only (e.g., "1-kg-Packung", "je Stück").
- Do NOT output legal price-per-unit info (e.g., "kg-Preis", "€/kg", "€/l") as unit.
- If multiple deals exist, include all of them.
ground_truth: [{"product_name": "ADVENTURIDGE Outdoor-Fleecejacke", "price": "7.99", "discount": null, "unit": null, "original_price": null}, {"product_name": "WINTERTRAUM Marzipan-kartoffeln", "price": "0.89", "discount": "40", "unit": null, "original_price": "1.49"}]

prompt:

Return ONLY valid JSON (no extra text).
Schema (JSON array of objects):
[
  {
    "product_name": string | null,
    "price": string | number | null,
    "discount": string | null,
    "unit": string | null,
    "original_price": string | number | null
  }
]
Rules:
- Use null if a field is missing.
- Keep prices as numbers or numeric strings (e.g., "1.99").
- Product name should focus on the item, not marketing text.
- Unit should be the package/unit only (e.g., "1-kg-Packung", "je Stück").
- Do NOT output legal price-per-unit info (e.g., "kg-Preis", "€/kg", "€/l") as unit.
- If multiple deals exist, include all of them.
ground_truth: [{"product_name": "GOURMET FINEST CUISINE Aufstrich mit 75 % Frucht", "price": "0.99", "discount": "33", "unit": "je 250-g-glas", "original_price": "1.49"}, {"product_name": "GOURMET FINEST CUISINE Gourmet-Pflaumen", "price": "1.79", "discount": "28", "unit": "je 580-ml-glas, abtropfgewicht 305 g", "original_price": "2.49"}, {"product_name": "GOURMET FINEST CUISINE Pasta al Bronzo", "price": "0.89", "discount": "31", "unit": "je 500-g-pack", "original_price": "1.29"}, {"product_name": "GOURMET FINEST CUISINE Winterliche Eisdesserts", "price": "1.89", "discount": "29", "unit": "je 280- bzw. 340-ml-pack", "original_price": "2.69"}, {"product_name": "GOURMET FINEST CUISINE Pesto", "price": "1.29", "discount": "35", "unit": "je 190-g-glas", "original_price": "1.99"}, {"product_name": "GOURMET FINEST CUISINE Leber-Pâté", "price": "1.19", "discount": "33", "unit": "je 130-g-glas", "original_price": "1.79"}, {"product_name": "GOURMET FINEST CUISINE Mini-Pandoro", "price": "0.89", "discount": "35", "unit": "80-g-pack", "original_price": "1.39"}]
